name: part_004
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】この叫びを届けるためにｰScreamｰ【#常闇トワ2周年記念】 [YsvEWEEUWa8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'daily dairy' by Tokoyami Towa, Amane Kanata, Shishiro Botan, and Yukihana Lamy.
MC section where the performers talk about their first collaboration as this group and exchange greetings.
Performance of the song 'Candy-Go-Round' by Tokoyami Towa, Nekomata Okayu, Ookami Mio, and Usada Pekora.

subtitles.original: いいことなんて そう起こらないリアル
subtitles.english: The reality is that good things don't happen that often

subtitles.original: だけどそのエッセンス
subtitles.english: But that essence

subtitles.original: 仮想の世界 夢に替えて
subtitles.english: Turn the virtual world into a dream

subtitles.original: 毎日がパラダイス
subtitles.english: Every day is paradise

subtitles.original: 思い切り遊んで笑っちゃおう！
subtitles.english: Let's play to our heart's content and laugh!

subtitles.original: どんな毎日も 楽しくなっちゃうんだ
subtitles.english: Every day becomes fun

subtitles.original: だって、いつだって ほらあなたが待ってるの
subtitles.english: Because, look, you're always waiting

subtitles.original: みんなで毎日を 出会えた嬉しいを
subtitles.english: Let's share every day, the joy of meeting each other

subtitles.original: みんなと一緒に 気分はね、もう最高潮！
subtitles.english: Together with everyone, our spirits are already at their peak!

subtitles.original: 窓の向こうの笑顔に手を振って
subtitles.english: Waving to the smiles beyond the window

subtitles.original: 配信でとどける our daily dairy
subtitles.english: Delivering our daily dairy through the stream

subtitles.original: daily dairy
subtitles.english: daily dairy

subtitles.original: 届けよう
subtitles.english: Let's deliver it

subtitles.original: はーい！やったー！
subtitles.english: Yay! We did it!

subtitles.original: え、うまくいきましたね？
subtitles.english: Eh, it went well, didn't it?

subtitles.original: いきましたねー！
subtitles.english: It did!

subtitles.original: いけましたねー！
subtitles.english: We made it!

subtitles.original: はい、ということで...っていつも言っちゃうんだけど、ということで、
subtitles.english: Yes, and so... I always say that, but anyway,

subtitles.original: はい、かなトワししらみで「daily dairy」を歌わせていただきましたー！
subtitles.english: Yes, we, Kanatowa-shishilamy, sang "daily dairy"!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございましたー！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: おめでとう！おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Congratulations! Congratulations!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！いや、かなたんもこの前おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you! No, Kanatan, congratulations recently too!

subtitles.original: おめでとう！あ、ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Congratulations! Ah, thank you!

subtitles.original: やったー！ということで、そして、あけましておめでとうございます！
subtitles.english: Yay! So, and also, Happy New Year!

subtitles.original: いや、なんだかんだかなトワとかししらみとかそういう組み合わせあったけど、この4人で集まることは、
subtitles.english: You know, we've had units like Kanatowa or Shishilamy, but gathering as these four...

subtitles.original: そう、初めてかも！初めて！
subtitles.english: Might be the first time! The first!

subtitles.original: 珍しい！なんでみんなそんな後ろ行ってんの？もっと来てよ！
subtitles.english: It's rare! Why is everyone going to the back? Come closer!

subtitles.original: いいのかい？いいのかい？どうですか、この並び。結構ね、いい感じじゃない？
subtitles.english: Is it okay? Is it okay? How's this lineup? It's pretty good, right?

subtitles.original: どう？なんか見たことあるようで実は初。そんな感じだよね。
subtitles.english: How is it? It feels like we've seen it before, but it's actually the first. That's the vibe.

subtitles.original: 「あれ、この4人でコラボしたことあるよね？」って言ったら「いや、なくない？」って。
subtitles.english: If you asked, "Wait, haven't these four collabed before?", the answer is "No, haven't we?"

subtitles.original: 「ないわ」「ないか」。お出かけとかしたいね。かなたんのファッションの...
subtitles.english: "No we haven't." "I see." I want to go out or something. Like, for Kanatan's fashion...

subtitles.original: え？みんなとファッションしてくれるんですか？
subtitles.english: Eh? Are you going to do fashion with me?

subtitles.original: ちょっと待って。ファッションね。お買い物行きますか、じゃあ。
subtitles.english: Wait a minute. Fashion, right. Shall we go shopping then?

subtitles.original: お買い物行きたい！でもこの中で一番おしゃれなの誰だと思う？
subtitles.english: I want to go shopping! But who do you think is the most stylish among us?

subtitles.original: いや、私！降ろせ降ろせ！許されへんぞ！そんなわけねぇだろ！
subtitles.english: No, it's me! Put your hands down! That won't be forgiven! No way!

subtitles.original: やっぱりラミィかな？でもトワ先輩だってファッションのってプロフィールに書いてますし。
subtitles.english: Maybe Lamy? But look, even Towa-senpai has "fashion" written in her profile.

subtitles.original: やめろ！やめろ！持ち上げんじゃねえ！
subtitles.english: Stop! Stop! Don't flatter me!

subtitles.original: すいません、すいません。おめでとうございます。
subtitles.english: Sorry, sorry. Congratulations.

subtitles.original: え、でも待って。トワさん、ちょっとこの4人で写真みたいなスクショ撮りたい。
subtitles.english: Eh, but wait. I want to take a picture, like a screenshot, with these four.

subtitles.original: 撮りたい！どうやって並ぶ？かなたん前行こ。あ、じゃあこうしますか。いいじゃーん！
subtitles.english: I want to! How should we line up? Kanatan, go to the front. Oh, like this? Nice!

subtitles.original: いい感じじゃない？撮って撮って！イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Isn't this good? Take it, take it! Yay!

subtitles.original: ま、こんな感じでまったり...あれ、急にテンションダウン？
subtitles.english: Well, in this relaxed way... huh, sudden drop in tension?

subtitles.original: いいんだよ、みんなと歌えればいいから。これからもよろしくお願いします。
subtitles.english: It's okay, as long as I can sing with everyone. Please look forward to working with us.

subtitles.original: なまいきな後輩と、なまいきじゃないが、なまいきな二人と、
subtitles.english: With the cheeky juniors—well, not cheeky, but with the two cheeky ones...

subtitles.original: 天使な、かなたんと。センスがね、完璧なかなたんと。
subtitles.english: And with the angelic Kanatan. With the Kanatan whose sense is perfect.

subtitles.original: 耳がよく聞こえないな。耳痛くなってきちゃった。はっ？
subtitles.english: I can't hear very well. My ears are starting to hurt. What?

subtitles.original: はい、ということで、かなトワししらみで「daily dairy」でしたー！バイバーイ！
subtitles.english: Yes, so, that was "daily dairy" by Kanatowa-shishilamy! Bye-bye!

subtitles.original: Moonlight Merry-Go-Round Candy-Go-Round
subtitles.english: Moonlight Merry-Go-Round Candy-Go-Round

subtitles.original: 夢のようなスピードで Escort
subtitles.english: Escort at a dream-like speed

subtitles.original: 時の流れはいつでもゆっくり
subtitles.english: The flow of time is always slow

subtitles.original: だけどハートの 動くスピード 気まぐれは UP
subtitles.english: But the speed at which the heart moves—the whim is "up"
